main event: A security guard at Keesler Air Force Base observed a large, bright, disc-shaped object hovering approximately 500 feet above the northwest corner of the base on October 10, 1957.
interesting points: The object was around 50 feet in diameter and emitted a pulsating white light., The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes., The object rapidly accelerated and disappeared from view., The report includes illustrations of similar unidentified flying objects., The document outlines protocols for reporting unidentified aerial phenomena.
location: Keesler Air Force Base, Mississippi, USA
